name: Healthyfied Vegetable Pancake
description: Indulge in a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar delight with our Healthyfied Vegetable Pancake. Perfect for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes without sacrificing flavor. This pancake packs a nutritious punch with fresh cabbage and carrots, all while keeping it exciting and delicious.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the raw cabbage and carrots.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, beat the eggs until fluffy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped cabbage, carrots, and tapioca flour to the beaten eggs. Stir until the ingredients are well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Pour a portion of the mixture into the pan, spreading it to form a pancake shape. Cook for about 4 minutes on each side or until golden brown and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
